plot outline: Idhuvum Kadandhu Pogum (This too shall pass) is a powerful drama about finding hope. It is a vivid, hopeful, honest portrait of a family searching for what remains possible in the most impossible of situations. Gautam and Ramya are a soon to be married happy couple whose perfect world is changed forever when Ramya is killed in a car accident. After Ramya dies, Gautam is lost. A few months after her loss, Gautam and his family are returning to their everyday existence in the wake of a shocking, sudden loss. The shifts come in abrupt, unforeseen moments. The resulting journey is an intimate glimpse into Gautam learning to re-engage his life with hope and a world that has been tilted off its axis.
